objectives.good: Arvedui moves off the north board edge
objectives.evil: reclaim the Palantir and move it off any board edge

specialRules.The Terror of Arnor: at end of Evil Move Phase, roll d6+Turn; if >=10, Gûlavhar enters from south edge
specialRules.The Palantir: Light Object initially carried by Arvedui, can't be voluntarily dropped/passed; dropped if possessor dies. Draw if non-Arvedui Good model carries off north edge
